channel.title: How do i join a server
channel.description: i have just started and i would like to know how do i join other peoples servers?

item.title: How do i join a server
item.dc:creator: @pirila2 pirila2
item.description:
@pirila2 wrote:

step by step u know
step1:download moparscape 3.2
step2:open the client of moparscape
step3:click ‘‘file’’ and ‘‘new server’’
step4:write the server ip there what would you want to join
step5:click ok and dont push the start server cose then it starts your own server where u can play only youself,no other players.
step6:make any kind of account and click log in

               Well done, you are logged in ;)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i join a server
